nobody.translation[0].definitions[0].exa: I knocked on the door but nobody answered.
nobody.translation[0].note_box[0].items[: Don’t use another negative word such as ‘not’ or ‘nothing’ after nobody You say
You use none of when talking about a group of people
You use neither of when talking about two people
Neither of his parents went to the wedding
Nobody is written as one word Don’t write
nobody.translation[1].definitions[0].def: someone who is not important and has no influence
nobody.translation[1].definitions[0].exa: I was a nothing and a nobody with everything to prove.
